## Data Processing
### Only take the columns we need - this will make processing faster.

```{r}
basedata <- read.csv("repdata_data_StormData.csv.bz2")
stormdata <- basedata[c("EVTYPE", 
                        "FATALITIES", 
                        "INJURIES", 
                        "PROPDMG", 
                        "PROPDMGEXP", 
                        "CROPDMG", 
                        "CROPDMGEXP")]
dim(stormdata)
```
